Posts.Content: Melissa1971 wrote: I just finished my last dose dense AC (4 rounds) and my tounge is so numb, and I can hardly taste anything unless sweet or salty (or minty). I start on taxotere in 2 weeks....does this side effect continue w/ the taxotere? I hope not. I hate chemo!!!!! I know it will benefit me in the long run,but going through it is hell. I look forward to the day when this entire experience is a distant memory! age 37 diagnosed Jan. 2009, IDC, Stage 1 , sentinal node biopsy clear, Grade 3, HER 2-, estrogen -, prog. - Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: numb tounge Melissa1971 Melissa1971

Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2009 03:54PM Melissa1971 wrote: Hi Ladies, I had my second round of AC last week and for the past couple of days have been experiencing terrible heartburn/backpain. I have taken pepcid complete and am eating well (very small meals) but the pain is terrible. It is in my upper back...feels like bottom of throat area. Anyone else have this experience? Any tips welcomed. Other than that my other side effects are being managed well. I didn't have this experience the first time around....
Posts.Title: More Tips (and a Shopping List) for Getting Through Chemo rock MinusTwo
